title: Bachelor of Science in Exercise Science
description: The Exercise Science degree at Kennesaw State University’s Wellstar College is a scientifically based program designed for you to meet the needs in the exercise science profession by developing your existing knowledge, honing your skills and growing your abilities as you learn through various domains.
careers: Physical Therapist, Occupational Therapist, Kinesiology, Sports Medicine, Sports Therapy
school: Department of Exercise Science and Sport Management
